channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Igglepiggle's Mucky Patch. Series for young children. Igglepiggle falls and gets mud on his tummy. Igglepiggle and Upsy Daisy ride in the Ninky Nonk and get muck over that too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Sharon D Clarke - Rusty the Squeaky Robot. Rusty is the only robot on Planet Robotone who squeaks, but he soon learns that it's good to be different. Read by Sharon D Clarke.
